navbar.update-neuron-with-ckb: The version of the CKB node does not match Neuron (v{{ version }}), which may cause compatibility issues. Please update to the latest version of Neuron.
navbar.ckb-node-compatible: CKB node is not compatible with Neuron (v{{ version }}), please check before further operation. (<0>{{btnText}}</0>)
navbar.ckb-without-indexer: Please add '--indexer' option to start local node

network-status.left-time-tip: The time remaining is an estimate and is related to the current network and other factors, and is for reference only.

title.select-model: Please connect your device and select the model
title.choose-address: Choose an address from the device

errors.multi-device: Multiple device detected. Only one device of the same model can be connected.
errors.device-not-found: No device detected. Please connect your device.
errors.ckb-app-not-found: CKB App does not open. Please open the CKB App on your device.

import-hardware.abort: Waiting for CKB app... Action aborted

status.label: Status:
status.user-input: Connected, waiting for confirmation on device...
status.disconnect: Disconnected, please confirm device has connect and open Nervos app

status.label: Status:
status.user-input: Connected, waiting for confirmation on device...
status.disconnect: Disconnected, please confirm device has connect and open Nervos app

offline-sign.title: Offline Sign
offline-sign.import-signed-transaction-detail: You have imported a signed transaction, please confirm and try again.
offline-sign.import-unsigned-transaction-detail: You have imported an unsigned transaction, please confirm and try again.

overview.first-sync-notice:
The initial synchronization requires at least {{size}} GB of disk space.
And the data size will increase over time. It is recommended to choose a larger disk space to store the data.

wizard.create-or-import-your-first-wallet: Create or import your first wallet
wizard.name: Name
wizard.your-wallet-seed-is: Your new wallet seed has been generated
wizard.set-wallet-name-and-password: Please name your wallet on this device and choose a strong password to protect it
wizard.set-wallet-name: Set a name for the wallet
wizard.set-a-strong-password-to-protect-your-wa: Please set a strong password to protect your wallet
wizard.new-name: Use an unused name for the new wallet
wizard.complex-password: The password should be 8 to 50 characters long containing at least three character categories among the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols.
wizard.same-password: The password and confirm password should match
wizard.input-seed-verify: Please enter the correct wallet seed or click back to recreate the wallet
wizard.input-seed-first-empty-space: You can paste the entire wallet seed to the first empty space
wizard.creating-wallet: Wallet is being preparing, please wait

import-keystore.title: Import Keystore File
import-keystore.import-failure-msg: Neuron does not support importing ckb-cli's keystore file due to different keystore file derivation rules.

placeholder.path: Click to select the keystore file
placeholder.name: Name for the new wallet

send.scan-to-get-address: Scan QR code to read the address to send to
send.scan-screen-qr-code: Scan the QR Code on the screen
send.remove-receiving-address-msg: Are you sure you want to remove the selected receiving address?
send.locktime-notice-content: According to the actual running block height, there may be some time variances in locktime.
send.locktime-warning: Please ensure that receiver's wallet can support expiration unlocking. (Note: 1.Exchanges generally do not support expiration unlocking {{extraNote}})
send.allow-use-sent-cell: Unconfirmed Outputs are allowed in this transaction.
send.transaction-cannot-amend: The current transaction is confirmed and cannot be amended.

receive.title: Receive
receive.prompt: Neuron picks a new receiving address for better privacy. Please go to the Address Book if you want to use a previously used receiving address.

search.placeholder: Search tx hash, address or date (yyyy-mm-dd)

general.keep-awake: Keep the screen awake during synchronization

lock-window.different-password: Two entered passwords do not match

importing-existing.title: Importing an existing wallet
importing-existing.detail: You imported a wallet that already exists, choose to replace the existing wallet or cancel the import.

detected-duplicate.title: Detected duplicate wallets
detected-duplicate.detail: You have duplicate wallets in your account and it is recommended that you choose to keep the wallet that needs to be unique to make it less difficult to manage.

network.remove-network-msg: Are you sure you want to remove the selected network?

data.clear-cache-description: Clear cache if you encounter data sync or balance display problems. Neuron will rescan block data.
data.clearing-cache: Clearing Cache, please wait a moment
data.remove-ckb-data-tip: Please move CKB Node Data from 【{{prevPath}}】 to 【{{currentPath}}】 and then click on "Data have been moved" to start from the previously synchronized block; Or click on "Synchronize from scratch" to start with synchronizing from scratch.
data.resync-ckb-node-describe: Attention: Synchronizing from scratch won't remove previously downloaded CKB Node Data
data.disabled-set-path: When the CKB node is started manually, the CKB Node Config and Storage path configuration doesn't take effect

unlock.title: Please input wallet password to claim the asset

create-account-to-claim-cheque.title: Claim Cheque Asset with New Account

password-request.xpub-notice: For watch-only wallet, only exporting transactions are supported

messages.addr-copied: Address has been copied to the clipboard
messages.qrcode-copied: QR Code has been copied to the clipboard
messages.remain-ckb-for-withdraw: It's suggested to reserve some CKBytes for withdraw operation
messages.decimal-range: Decimal should be an integer of {{range}}(inclusive)
messages.experimental-message-hardware: This is an experimental feature. Please pay attention to the risk and use with caution.
messages.experimental-message: This is an experimental feature, it could change at any time. Please use with caution.
messages.rebuild-sync:
For better user experience, Neuron has adopted a new storage, which requires a migrating of data (estimated 20 ~ 60min).
Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.migrate-warning: Warning: The migration process may fail for unknown reasons resulting in resynchronization, please back up manually and start the migration!
messages.light-client-locktime-warning: 2.Light client mode doesn't support showing lock-time CKBytes.
messages.light-client-cheque-warning: Warning: Light client mode doesn't support showing Cheque assets.

codes.101: The amount {{amount}} CKB is too small, please enter an amount no less than {{required}} CKB.
codes.104: Fail to connect to the node, please restart Neuron.
codes.105: You need more capacities for change (more than 61 CKBytes).
codes.106: You need more capacities for change (more than 61 CKBytes), or slide to the end to send all your balance.
codes.107: The amount {{amount}} CKB is too small, transfer with locktime requires an amount no less than 69 CKB.
codes.108: The given address does not belong to current wallet. Please check your wallet or wait for synchronizing complete.
codes.110: Insufficient available balance, please try again when last transaction has been confirmed.
codes.113: Keystore is invalid, please check your file integrity.
codes.114: The minimal transfer balance is {{bytes}} CKBytes.
codes.115: You need more capacities for change (more than 61 CKBytes), or click 'Max' button to send all your balance.
codes.203: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) should be shorter than or equal to {{length}}
codes.204: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) is too short, it should be longer than or equal to {{length}}.
codes.206: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) is invalid, please enter the $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) with no more than {{length}} decimal places.
codes.207: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it cannot be negative.
codes.208: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it should start with http(s)://
codes.210: "{{value}}" is reserved, please use another one.
codes.309: The receiver needs to upgrade her account address to accept more transfer.
codes.402: CKB App does not open. Please open the CKB App on your device.
codes.403: No device detected. Please connect your device
codes.404: Multiple device detected. Only one device of the same model can be connected.
codes.600: Please make sure the sync has finalized before you do any transaction related operation.

sync.sync-failed-detail: Synchronization failed due to network node or other problems.
sync.sync-not-start: Sync not started yet, please try to restart Neuron Wallet

nervos-dao.notice-wait-time: Notice: You are initiating withdrawn and the final withdrawn will need to wait for {{epochs}} epochs {{blocks}} blocks (about {{days}} days).
nervos-dao.deposit-terms:
Nervos DAO needs 102 CKBytes for deposit cell storage, which is not compensation-bearing.
Please visit the <0>Nervos DAO RFC for more information about Nervos DAO
nervos-dao.minimal-fee-required: The minimum deposit capacity is {{minimal}} CKBytes
nervos-dao.withdraw-alert: Hint: there are only {{epochs}} epochs (~{{hours}} hours) until the end of your current lock period. If you wish to withdraw in current lock period, please send withdraw request in time. There are {{nextLeftEpochs}} epochs(~{{days}} days) until the end of your next lock period.
nervos-dao.balance-not-reserved: Don't reserve any CKBytes for future DAO operations (Not recommended)
nervos-dao.attention: Attention: Once deposited into the Nervos DAO, your deposits will be locked for at least 180 Epochs (about 30 days).

deposit-record.insufficient-balance-to-unlock: Balance is not enough for transaction fee to unlock the deposit
deposit-record.lock-warn: Lock to end of current compensation cycle

tooltip.immature-for-withdraw: It takes at least about 16 hours (4epochs) to proceed the next action
tooltip.normal: Compensation amount is low, withdraw action is not recommended
tooltip.suggested: Suggested withdraw period for maximized compensation
tooltip.ending: Requested withdraw may be postponed and locked for an extra cycle of 30 days

stage-messages.immature-for-withdraw: CKB cannot be withdrawn for the next {{ hours }} hours
stage-messages.immature-for-unlock: CKB cannot be unlocked for the next {{ hours }} hours
stage-messages.next-compensation-cycle: The next compensation cycle will start in approximately {{days}} days
stage-messages.next-compensation-cycle-hours: The next compensation cycle will start in approximately {{hours}} hours
stage-messages.compensation-cycle-will-end: Compensation cycle ends in approximately {{days}} days
stage-messages.compensation-cycle-will-end-hours: Compensation cycle ends in approximately {{hours}} hours
stage-messages.compensation-cycle-has-ended: Cycle has ended, CKB is ready to be unlocked

updates.update-not-available: There are currently no updates available.
updates.updates-downloaded-about-to-quit-and-ins: Update downloaded. Ready to install and relaunch.

datetime.start-tomorrow: Selected time should start from tomorrow.

sign-and-verify.address-not-found: The given address does not belong to current wallet. Please check your wallet or wait for synchronizing complete.
sign-and-verify.sign-with-magic-byte: Message will be signed with magic bytes 'Nervos Message:'
sign-and-verify.verify-tip: Could be verified by Neuron from v0.33.1
sign-and-verify.verify-old-sign-success: Message was signed by Neuron before v0.33.1
sign-and-verify.input-choose-address: Please input or choose an address

special-assets.title: Customized Assets
special-assets.user-defined-asset-tooltip: This is an uncataloged asset，Neuron cannot process it now，please use a third-party software to check.
special-assets.locked-asset-tooltip: Lock parameter is {{epochs}} epochs, estimated release date is {{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}(according to the actual running block height, there may be some time variances in locktime).
special-assets.withdraw-asset-tooltip: Estimate release time is {{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}} {{hour}}:{{minute}}(according to the actual running block height).
special-assets.user-defined-token-tooltip: Migrate {{udtType}} asset to a {{udtType}} Asset Account
special-assets.release-success: Asset was released, view details in History.
special-assets.migrate-sudt-success: Conversion to new {{udtType}} asset account successful
special-assets.unlock-success: Asset claimed, go to transaction history for details
special-assets.withdraw-cheque-success: Asset withdrawn, go to transaction history for details
special-assets.claim-cheque-success: Asset claimed, go to transaction history for details

turn-into-new-account.title: Turn into a new {{udtType}} Asset Account
turn-into-new-account.sub-title: Turn the {{udtType}} Asset into a new {{udtType}} Account, occupies at least 142 CKBytes

transfer-to-exist-account.title: Transfer to a {{udtType}} Asset Account
transfer-to-exist-account.sub-title: Transfer all {{udtType}} balance to an existing {{udtType}} Account, please make sure the target account is alive

account-list.title: Asset Accounts
account-list.no-asset-accounts: No sUDT asset has been detected
account-list.search: Account Name, Token Name or Symbol
account-list.syncing: Syncing, current data may be inaccurate

create-dialog.delete-failed: Failed to delete the multisig config, reason for failure: {{reason}}

placeholder.token-id: Token ID is the Args of the {{udtType}} Type Script, which is the same as the lock hash of the token issuer.

send.title: Send

cheque-address-hint.label: Lock 162 CKBytes temporarily
cheque-address-hint.tooltip: 162 CKBytes capacity is going to be temporarily locked to initialize the token transfer, and it will be automatically unlocked after the token being claimed by the receiver.

send.destroy-ckb-desc: Will return all CKB of this CKB Asset account to your change address.
send.destroy-sudt-desc: Will return the asset account occupied CKB to your change address.

extra-ckb-send-to-secp256.label: Send extra 142 CKBytes along with {{assetName}}
extra-ckb-send-to-secp256.tooltip: Extra 142 CKBytes will be sent along with {{assetName}} to hold the asset

extra-ckb-send-to-acp.label: Send extra {{extraCKB}} CKBytes to create an asset account for receiver

extra-ckb-send-to-unknow.label: Receive address has an unknown lock script, please make sure receiver knowns how to handle it, and extra {{extraCKB}} CKBytes will be sent along with {{assetName}} to hold the asset

send.select-option: Please confirm the above option before submitting

multisig-address.guide-tip: Refer to the Multisig documentation to <0>learn more</0>.

import-dialog.notice: Only one configuration can be imported at a time. If the content of the file is an array, the first one is imported by default.

multisig-address.remove-multisig-address-msg: Are you sure you want to remove the selected multisig address?
multisig-address.synchronization-abort-msg: Leaving the current window will cause the multisig synchronization to be aborted, so please confirm to leave.

m-n.title: Please input the multisig address configuration in the m-of-n type where any m private keys out of a possible n are required to move the asset.
m-n.m-less-equal-n: For m-of-n multisig address, m shouldn't be greater than n

multi-address-info.title: Please input the signers for the {{m}}-of-{{n}} multisig address

approve-dialog.title: Approve with multisig address
approve-dialog.signerApprove: Lack of {{m}} signer approval(s), including {{r}} from specified signer(s)

price-switch.errorTip: Price cannot be less than {{minPrice}} shannons/KB, please re-enter
price-switch.countDownTip: The price will refresh after {{countDown}} seconds

set-start-block-number.title: Set the start block number
set-start-block-number.warn: Warning: Transactions before the start block of synchronization will not be synchronized
set-start-block-number.tip: The start sync block number is configuration when use light client ckb node, then you can set it and quick the sync
set-start-block-number.input-place-holder: Please enter the start sync block number, eg: 10,100,101
set-start-block-number.set-less-than-before: The block number you set is smaller than the previous set, the synchronization will restart, please proceed with caution.
set-start-block-number.reset-to-header-tip-number: Unable to set a block number greater than the header tip block number, reset to the header tip block number.

external-node-detected-dialog.title: Detected external node
external-node-detected-dialog.body-tips-without-network: You have selected the internal node but started the external node, if you want to continue to use an external node, please add a new network.
external-node-detected-dialog.body-tips-with-network: You have currently selected an internal node but started an external node, if you need to continu using the external node please switch to another external network or add a new network.

no-disk-space-dialog.tip:
Due to insufficient disk space, synchronization has been stopped.
Please allocate more disk space or migrate the data to another disk.

import-exist-xpubkey-dialog.replace-tip: The watch-wallet has been imported before, would you replace it?
import-exist-xpubkey-dialog.delete-tip: The same original wallet existed. If you want to continue with the import, please delete it.

locked-reason.multi-locktime: The cell has a time lock and you can't use it until {{time}}.
locked-reason.multi-locktime-reached: The time lock for this cell has expired and you need to claim it in Customized Assets before using it.
locked-reason.cheque-acp-multisig: This is a {{type}} cell and does not support unlocking.
locked-reason.NFT-SUDT-DAO: This is a {{type}} asset and does not support unlocking.
locked-reason.Unknown: This is an uncataloged asset,please check and confirm before proceeding.

cell-lock-dialog.title: Lock Cell
cell-lock-dialog.locked-cell-can-not-use: Warn, locked Cells can not use

cell-consume-dialog.title: Consume Cell
cell-consume-dialog.warn-consume: Consume cell will not keep any data and use all of the ckb, please ensure that no important data needs to be retained

cell-consolidate-dialog.title: Consolidate Cells
cell-consolidate-dialog.warn-consume: All selected cells will be consolidated into a new cell, make sure that selected cells do not contain important data.

lock-window.failed-times: Failed more than {{frequency}} times, please retry after {{time}}
